script_logic.purpose: Run benchmark tests of miniFE application using different communication methods (DART, DASH, MPI-RMA, MPI) with and without DMAPP enabled
script_logic.process_scaling: The script iterates through different processor counts (1k, 2k, 4k, 8k) by increasing the number of nodes used
script_logic.communication_methods: The script runs miniFE using DART (dynamic and allocate), DASH, MPI-RMA, and MPI with both DMAPP enabled and disabled
script_logic.data_recording: Each run of miniFE is timed and the output is redirected to a log file
